thread.title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, Boeing, Pfizer, Hasbro, Tapestry - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: Stocks to Watch: Apple, Boeing, Pfizer, Hasbro, Tapestry - MoneyBeat - WSJ
text: Here are some of the companies with shares expected to trade actively in Monday’s session. Stock movements reflect premarket trading. —Up 0.5%: Apple releases quarterly earnings after the closing bell, and the company is expected to provide details on how much of its $269 billion overseas cash pile is coming investors’ way. —Down 0.7%: Aerospace Sugar Low: Commodity Plummets on Surplus Next Brexit & Beyond: U.S. Allies Worry About Trump's Next Trade Move
